comments.author: Julian Reschke
comments.body: Proposed patch, adds support to server, and client, also adds test case.

description: RFC4918, Section 14.8 (<http://greenbytes.de/tech/webdav/rfc4918.html#rfc.section.14.8>) defines an extension to PROPFIND that allows clients to retrieve all RFC2518 properties, the dead properties, plus a set of additional live properties. This can help avoiding a second roundtrip to retrieve really all properties.
